content: This course will introduce abstract groups. We will start with definitions, basic properties and constructions and cover many important theorems in basic group theory, such as Lagrange?¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢s theorem, Cauchy?¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢s theorem and Sylow theorems. A major emphasis of the course will be to present numerous worked-out examples and problems. A part of the lecture every week will be devoted to explicit calculations.
